Title: Choosing and Creating Engaging Topics
Content: Selecting the right topic is crucial for creating a popular post on Xiaohongshu. Start by researching popular topics within your niche. For example, search for 'English CET-4 notes' to find trending content. Save these examples and use them as inspiration. The key elements to focus on are the cover image, title, and content. Use real photos or handwritten notes as cover images, as these tend to attract more attention. For titles, look for popular ones and adapt them to your content. The goal is to create a visually appealing and relevant post that stands out. By mimicking successful posts and adding your unique touch, you can increase the chances of your content going viral.

Title: Using Visuals and Titles Effectively
Content: Visuals and titles play a significant role in attracting viewers to your post. For visuals, use real photos or handwritten notes, as these are more likely to catch the eye. You can find such images by searching for 'English CET-4 notes' online and saving the ones that fit your needs. If the images have watermarks, use tools like Meitu Xiuxiu to remove them. For titles, search for popular keywords related to your topic on Xiaohongshu. Look at posts with high engagement and use their titles as a reference. Modify the titles slightly to make them your own. This approach ensures that your post appears in search results and attracts more clicks. Remember, the combination of an appealing visual and a catchy title is essential for drawing in viewers.

Title: Creating and Posting Content
Content: Creating and posting content on Xiaohongshu involves several steps. First, gather your visuals and edit them to fit the platform's 3:4 ratio using tools like Meitu Xiuxiu. Next, find popular posts related to your topic and extract their content using a tool like 'Yi Jiexie' on WeChat. Copy the content and modify it to make it unique. When posting, add relevant hashtags and topics to increase visibility. If you have a group chat, link it to your post to encourage interaction. Ensure that your content is engaging and provides value to the readers. By following these steps, you can create posts that attract high engagement and grow your follower base.
